examples.prefix: Jeder Mensch kann seine Gefühle anders
examples.translation: Each person can perceive their feelings differently.

examples.prefix: Es ist nicht gesund, seine Gefühle zu
examples.translation: It's not healthy to suppress your feelings.
I usually awaken by myself, without an alarm clock.

examples.suffix: ich mich auf den Arbeitstag vor.
examples.translation: In the morning, I prepare myself for the workday.

examples.suffix: zuerst die wichtigsten Aufgaben am Morgen.
examples.translation: I first take care of the most important tasks in the morning.
Every other day, I shave after showering.

examples.suffix: ich als erstes die Kaffeemaschine ein.
examples.translation: In the morning, the first thing I do is turn on the coffee machine.

examples.prefix: Wenn ich verschlafe, muss ich mich
examples.translation: When I oversleep, I have to hurry to be on time.

examples.suffix: ich mich mit einem frischen Handtuch ab.
examples.translation: After showering, I dry myself with a fresh towel.

examples.suffix: ich meine Kleidung für den nächsten Tag zusammen.
examples.translation: The evening before, I put together my clothes for the next day.
During breakfast, I look through my emails.

examples.prefix: Es ist wichtig, sich jeden Morgen gut zu
examples.translation: It's important to groom yourself well every morning.
I have to manage many tasks daily.

examples.prefix: Ich versuche, alle wichtigen Aufgaben vor dem Mittagessen zu
examples.translation: I try to complete all important tasks before lunch.

examples.prefix: Nach der Arbeit muss ich noch Lebensmittel
examples.translation: After work, I still need to get groceries.

examples.prefix: Ich möchte das Projekt bis Ende der Woche
examples.translation: I want to complete the project by the end of the week.

examples.suffix: meine Arbeit für eine kurze Mittagspause.
examples.translation: I interrupt my work for a short lunch break.
After the break, I continue my work.
In my free time, I occupy myself with photography.
I need to carefully manage my schedule.

examples.suffix: ich Wartungsarbeiten an meinem Computer durch.
examples.translation: I regularly carry out maintenance on my computer.

examples.prefix: Es ist wichtig, die verfügbare Zeit gut
examples.translation: It's important to organize the available time well.
I like to prepare my meals myself.
We enjoy meals together as a family.
The restaurant serves traditional regional specialties.

examples.suffix: ich oft Reste vom Vortag auf.
examples.translation: At lunch, I often warm up leftovers from the day before.

examples.prefix: Die Suppe mit Salz und Pfeffer
examples.translation: Season the soup with salt and pepper.
I like to try out new recipes.

examples.suffix: sein Frühstück immer in aller Ruhe.
examples.translation: He always consumes his breakfast in peace.
I always shop for fresh ingredients.

examples.prefix: Nach einem langen Arbeitstag muss ich erst einmal
examples.translation: After a long workday, I first need to switch off.

examples.suffix: ich mich bei einem guten Buch.
examples.translation: In the evening, I relax with a good book.
Before going to bed, I reflect on the day.

examples.suffix: ich alles für den nächsten Tag vor.
examples.translation: In the evening, I prepare everything for the next day.

examples.prefix: Vor dem Schlafengehen sollte man bewusst
examples.translation: Before going to bed, one should consciously wind down.
Sometimes I play relaxing music in the evening.
Before going to bed, I turn off all electronic devices.

examples.prefix: Abends habe ich Zeit, über wichtige Entscheidungen
examples.translation: In the evening, I have time to think about important decisions.

examples.prefix: Ich muss genügend Zeit für das Projekt
examples.translation: I need to schedule enough time for the project.

examples.prefix: Wir sollten einen Termin für das Treffen
examples.translation: We should set a date for the meeting.

examples.prefix: Wir müssen die Besprechung auf nächste Woche
examples.translation: We need to postpone the meeting until next week.
Can we move the appointment forward?
I need to organize my daily routine better.
We need to coordinate our schedules with each other.
It's important to adhere to deadlines.
Please don't exceed the conversation time.
